myminio_bucket_linked: ${user} linked the My MinIO bucket ${bucket} to ${node}
myminio_bucket_unlinked: ${user} unselected the My MinIO bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
myminio_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to My MinIO bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
myminio_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in My MinIO bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
myminio_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in My MinIO bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
myminio_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in My MinIO bucket ${bucket} in ${node}
myminio_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the My MinIO addon for ${node}
myminio_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the My MinIO addon for ${node}
